show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Bioneers’ “Moonrise” of Women’s Leadership
content: A talk with Nina Simons, cofounder and coExecutive Director of the Bioneers network (bioneers.org) about her sense of... <!--more--> the role of Relational Intelligence in transforming leadership; the Moonrise leadership program for women; the upcoming, 23rd annual Bioneers conference and simultaneous regional conferences about ecosocial solutions that work and “resilient communities”; poem by Lesel Mueller
